Summary Note:
Vogel Verhoeven Spaans and the RM are childhood friends, having attended the same schools and shared many life experiences. Their enduring friendship has laid a solid foundation for their business relationship.
With a career spanning nearly 46 years, Vogel Verhoeven Spaans has established himself as a key player in the industry.
Julius Baer's personalized approach and dedication to client success were key factors in his decision to join.
Family Background: Vogel Verhoeven Spaans is currently widowed. He has 2 kids called Tess and Van Dijk.
Education Background:
In 1973, Vogel finished his secondary school education at VWO Dalton Den Haag.
Vogel completed his university education at Utrecht University in 1978.
Occupation History:
Vogel Verhoeven Spaans is a 70 year old and comes from Netherlands.
Vogel Verhoeven Spaans's first role was as a Hotel Manager at NH Hotel Group Nederland B.V., where he worked diligently from 1979 to 1980 to establish a strong reputation.
In 1981, he moved to Accor Hospitality Nederland B.V. to work as a General Manager, applying his knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
From 1982 to 1986, he served as a Regional Vice President at InterContinental Hotels Group Nederland B.V., solidifying his position as a leader in the industry.
After 7 years of dedication, he assumed the role of CEO at NH Hotel Group Nederland B.V. in 1986, spearheading high-profile projects and mentoring junior colleagues.
Vogel Verhoeven Spaans concluded his career as a Hospitality Industry Leader at Accor Hospitality Nederland B.V., where he worked from 1992 until retirement.
Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 2290000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
His remarkable portfolio comprises 3 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Leiden, Arnhem and Enschede, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.
He does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Vogel as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
